medalMultiEntireTeam.statDescription: Land final blows on the entire enemy team before any of them respawn.

medalStreakCombined.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 3 opposing Guardians while assisting or assisted by your teammates.

medalStreak5x.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 5 opposing Guardians.

medalStreak10x.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 10 opposing Guardians.

medalStreakTeam.statDescription: As a team, defeat 7 opposing Guardians without any of your team dying.

medalStreakAbsurd.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 20 opposing Guardians

medalPayback.statDescription: Land the final blow on the Guardian who last defeated you.

medalAvenger.statDescription: Defeat an opponent who just defeated an ally.

medalQuickStrike.statDescription: Defeat an opponent within the first 20 seconds of a match.

medalDefense.statDescription: Land a final blow on an opponent who has damaged an ally.

medalDefeatHunterDodge.statDescription: Defeat a Hunter attempting to dodge.

medalDefeatTitanBrace.statDescription: Defeat a Titan within 3 seconds of their deploying a Barricade.

medalDefeatWarlockSigil.statDescription: Defeat a Warlock while they are within their active Rift.

medalCycle.statDescription: In a single match, land at least one final blow with each class of weapon (Kinetic, Energy, Power) and ability (Melee, Grenade, Super).

medalSuperShutdown.statDescription: Defeat an opposing Guardian using your Super while their Super is active.

medalMatchNeverTrailed.statDescription: Win a match in which your team never trailed.

medalMatchComeback.statDescription: Win a match after having trailed by a significant margin.

medalMatchBlowout.statDescription: Win a match with a large margin of victory.

medalMatchMostDamage.statDescription: Deal the most total damage to opponents in a single match.

medalMatchUndefeated.statDescription: Complete a match in which you are never defeated by an opponent.

medalAbilityDawnbladeSlam.statDescription: Defeat an opponent with Phoenix Dive while Daybreak is active.

medalAbilityDawnbladeAerial.statDescription: In a single Daybreak activation, defeat two or more opponents without touching the ground.

medalAbilityVoidwalkerVortex.statDescription: Defeat an opponent with a Nova Bomb Vortex.

medalAbilityVoidwalkerDistance.statDescription: Defeat two or more opponents with a Nova Bomb that was in the air for at least 5 seconds.

medalAbilityStormcallerLandfall.statDescription: Defeat an opponent with Landfall while casting Stormtrance.

medalAbilityStormcallerMulti.statDescription: Defeat two or more opponents in a single Stormtrance activation.

medalAbilityFlowwalkerQuick.statDescription: Defeat an opponent within 3 seconds of activating Arc Staff.

medalAbilityFlowwalkerMulti.statDescription: Defeat 3 opponents in a single Arc Staff activation.

medalAbilityGunslingerQuick.statDescription: Defeat an opponent within 2 seconds of activating Golden Gun.

medalAbilityGunslingerMulti.statDescription: Defeat 3 opponents in a single Golden Gun activation.

medalAbilityNightstalkerTetherQuick.statDescription: Defeat a tethered opponent within 5 seconds of casting Shadowshot.

medalAbilityNightstalkerLongRange.statDescription: Defeat an opponent with  Shadowshot at a distance  greater than 30 meters.

medalAbilitySentinelWard.statDescription: Block fatal damage within 2 seconds of activating Ward of Dawn.

medalAbilitySentinelCombo.statDescription: Defeat an opponent with a Shield Bash within 3 seconds of defeating an opponent with a Sentinel Shield melee.

medalAbilityJuggernautSlam.statDescription: Defeat two or more opponents in a single Fists of Havoc slam.

medalAbilityJuggernautCombo.statDescription: In a single activation, defeat two opponents with Shoulder Charge, then a third with Fists of Havoc.

medalAbilitySunbreakerLongRange.statDescription: Defeat an opponent with Hammer of Sol at a distance  greater than 30 meters.

medalAbilitySunbreakerMulti.statDescription: Defeat three opponents within a single Hammer of Sol activation.

medalWeaponAuto.statDescription: In a single match, defeat 7 opponents with Auto Rifle final blows.

medalWeaponPulse.statDescription: In a single match, defeat 7 opponents with Pulse Rifle final blows.

medalWeaponScout.statDescription: In a single match, defeat 5 opponents at long range with  Scout Rifle final blows.

medalWeaponHandCannon.statDescription: In a single life, defeat two opponents with precision Hand Cannon final blows.

medalWeaponSmg.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 2 opponents with Submachine Gun final blows.

medalWeaponSidearm.statDescription: Deliver a final blow with a Sidearm within 5 seconds of landing a final blow with any other weapon.

medalWeaponSniper.statDescription: Defeat two opponents with long range, precision Sniper Rifle final blows without switching weapons or reloading.

medalWeaponFusion.statDescription: In a single life, defeat two opponents with a Fusion Rifle.

medalWeaponRocket.statDescription: Defeat two or more opponents with a single rocket.

medalWeaponGrenade.statDescription: In a single life, defeat three opponents with Grenade Launcher final blows.

medalWeaponShotgun.statDescription: Defeat two opponents at close range with a Shotgun without switching weapons or reloading.

medalWeaponSword.statDescription: Defeat two opponents with a sword without switching weapons.

medalCountdownDefense.statDescription: Countdown: Defeat an opponent within 5 seconds of them setting a charge.

medalCountdownDetonated.statDescription: Countdown: Set a charge that successfully detonates.

medalCountdownDefusedMulti.statDescription: Countdown: Defuse multiple charges in a single match.

medalCountdownDefusedLastStand.statDescription: Countdown: Defuse the charge as the last Guardian standing.

medalCountdownRoundAllAlive.statDescription: Countdown: Win a round with your entire team alive.

medalCountdownPerfect.statDescription: Countdown: Win a Countdown match in which your opponent never scores and never sets a charge.

medalSurvivalWinLastStand.statDescription: Survival: Win a round as the last surviving Guardian on your team.

medalSurvivalUndefeated.statDescription: Survival: Win a round without being defeated.

medalSurvivalQuickWipe.statDescription: Survival: As a team, win a round within 1 minute.

medalSurvivalKnockout.statDescription: Survival: Land all knockout blows on the opposing team in a single round.

medalSurvivalComeback.statDescription: Survival: Win a round despite being scoreless on Match Point.

medalSurvivalTeamUndefeated.statDescription: Survival: Win a match where no one on your team is defeated across all rounds.

medalControlAdvantageHold.statDescription: Control: Hold two or more zones for at least 1 minute.

medalControlPerimeterKill.statDescription: Control: Recapture a zone within 15 seconds of it being captured by your opponents.

medalControlCaptureAllZones.statDescription: Control: Defeat two opponents with Zone Advantage within 10 seconds of capturing a zone.

medalControlMostAdvantage.statDescription: Control: Complete a Control match with the most combined Advantage and Power Play kills.

medalControlAdvantageStreak.statDescription: Control: Score five Advantage or Power Play kills before the opponent recaptures a zone.

medalControlPowerPlayWipe.statDescription: Control: As a team, defeat all opposing Guardians at least once during a single Power Play.

medalSupremacyFirstCrest.statDescription: Supremacy: Secure the first crest in a match.

medalSupremacySecureStreak.statDescription: Supremacy: Secure three opposing crests in a single life.

medalSupremacyRecoverStreak.statDescription: Supremacy: Recover three allied crests in a single life.

medalSupremacyNeverCollected.statDescription: Supremacy: Complete a match in which your crest is never collected by an opponent.

medalSupremacyCrestCreditStreak.statDescription: Supremacy: In a single life, create five consecutive crests that are secured by your teammates.

medalSupremacyPerfectSecureRate.statDescription: Supremacy: Complete a match with the most crests created and a 100% secure rate.

medalMayhemFirstSuper.statDescription: Mayhem: Cast the first Super of the match.

medalMayhemGrenadeStreak.statDescription: Mayhem: In a single life, land five grenade final blows.

medalMayhemMeleeStreak.statDescription: Mayhem: In a single life, land three melee final blows.

medalMayhemCastStreak.statDescription: Mayhem: In a single life, cast three Supers.

medalMayhemCastMulti.statDescription: Mayhem: As a team, rapidly cast all of your Supers.

medalMayhemKillStreak.statDescription: Mayhem: As a team, land 10 Super final blows without anyone on your team being defeated.

medalCrimsonWeaponCombo.statDescription: Crimson Days: In a single round, both you and your partner must land one final blow each with Kinetic, Energy, and Power weapons.

medalCrimsonRevengeMulti.statDescription: Crimson Days: Rapidly defeat both your opponents while your partner is down.

medalCrimsonApartMulti.statDescription: Crimson Days: As a pair, defeat both your opponents within 3 seconds while they are separated from each other.

medalCrimsonSuddenDeath.statDescription: Crimson Days: Win a match in sudden death.

medalRumbleDefeatAllClasses.statDescription: Rumble: In a single life, defeat at least one Hunter, one Titan, and one Warlock.

medalRumbleUnassistedStreak.statDescription: Rumble: In a single life, land three unassisted final blows without taking any damage in between.

medalRumbleStealStreak.statDescription: Rumble: In a single life, steal five final blows from your opponents.

medalRumbleTop3.statDescription: Rumble: Finish in the top three.

medalRumbleDefeatAllPlayers.statDescription: Rumble: In a single life, defeat each opposing player at least once.

medalRumbleBetterThanAllCombined.statDescription: Rumble: Win a match with a score greater than the sum of all opponents' scores.

medalShowdownMostKills.statDescription: Showdown: Defeat the most opponents in a single round.

medalShowdownAmmoStreak.statDescription: Showdown: As a team, collect three consecutive ammo crates in a single match.

medalShowdownRetakeLead.statDescription: Showdown: Within a round, retake the lead after trailing by 5 points.

medalShowdownFullTeamSurvival.statDescription: Showdown: Win a Final Showdown in which your entire team survives.

medalShowdownForceFinalRound.statDescription: Showdown: Force a Final Showdown round after trailing 0–2.

medalShowdownUndefeated.statDescription: Showdown: Win a match in which no one on your team is defeated.

medals_pvecomp_medal_invader_kill_four.statDescription: As an invader, defeat four opposing Guardians in a single invasion.

medals_pvecomp_medal_massacre.statDescription: Defeat 12 enemies with no more than 3 seconds between kills.

medals_pvecomp_medal_no_escape.statDescription: Defeat an invader with 5 seconds or less left on their timer.

medals_pvecomp_medal_blockbuster.statDescription: Defeat three Blockers with no more than 3 seconds between kills.

medals_pvecomp_medal_tags_denied_15.statDescription: As an invader, defeat a Guardian carrying 15 Motes.

medals_pvecomp_medal_bank_kill.statDescription: As an invader, defeat a Guardian who is carrying Motes near the bank.

medals_pvecomp_medal_denied.statDescription: As an invader, deny at least 10 Motes by destroying all Guardians who are carrying Motes.

medals_pvecomp_medal_invasion_shutdown.statDescription: Defeat an invader within 10 seconds of their appearance in your arena before they defeat anyone on your team.

medals_pvecomp_medal_locksmith.statDescription: Defeat the last Blocker at your team's bank three times in a single round.

medals_pvecomp_medal_block_party.statDescription: As a team, have four Blockers at the enemy's bank at the same time.

medals_pvecomp_medal_never_say_die.statDescription: Come back from a 25% deficit in Primeval health to win the round.

medals_pvecomp_medal_half_banked.statDescription: Deposit at least half your bank's capacity in a single round.

medals_pvecomp_medal_everyone_invaded.statDescription: As a team, have all four players invade at least once during a round.

medals_pvecomp_medal_killmonger.statDescription: Defeat 20 enemies in a single match without dying.

medals_pvecomp_medal_thrillmonger.statDescription: Defeat 40 enemies in a single match without dying.

medals_pvecomp_medal_overkillmonger.statDescription: Defeat 80 enemies in a single match without dying.

medals_pvecomp_medal_first_to_block.statDescription: Be the first player in a round to lock the other team's bank.

medals_pvecomp_medal_big_game_hunter.statDescription: Defeat three powerful enemies within a short time period.

medals_pvecomp_medal_kill_after_invasion.statDescription: As an invader, get a kill after your time limit expires.

medals_pvecomp_medal_revenge.statDescription: Before you die again, defeat the player who last defeated you.

medals_pvecomp_medal_revenge_same_invasi.statDescription: After reviving, defeat the invader who destroyed you before they escape.

medals_pvecomp_medal_fist_of_havoc_multi.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Fists of Havoc Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_meteor_strike_multi.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Thundercrash Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_void_shield_multiki.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Sentinel Shield Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_thermal_hammer_mult.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multple enemies with a single Hammer of Sol Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_thermal_maul_multik.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Burning Maul Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_arc_staff_multikill.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Arc Staff Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_golden_gun_multikil.statDescription: Defeat three enemies with a single Golden Gun Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_thermal_knives_mult.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Blade Barrage Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_void_blade_multikil.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Spectral Blades Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_void_bow_multikill.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies tethered from a single Shadowshot Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_arc_lightning_multi.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Stormtrance Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_arc_beam_multikill.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Chaos Reach Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_nova_bomb_multikill.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Nova Bomb Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_nova_pulse_multikil.statDescription: Defeat a large number of enemies with a single Nova Warp Super.

medals_pvecomp_medal_thermal_sword_multi.statDescription: Rapidly defeat multiple enemies with a single Dawnblade Super.

Medals_pvecomp_medal_thermal_sword_heali.statDescription: Defeat a large number of enemies while inside the aura from a single Well of Radiance Super.
